headline: Go Ahead and Complain. It Might Help You.
abstract: A mantra to embrace: “This sucks I’m unhappy with what’s going on.”
lead_paragraph: We’ve all done it: Whether it’s about traffic, our boss or our partner’s annoying habits, complaining “is just something we do, like breathing — though hopefully not as often,” said Robin Kowalski, a professor of psychology at Clemson University.
